oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1861 edition of William Hardee's Rifle and Infantry Tactics, Vol. II
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Inscription and cover page of "Rifle and Infantry Tactics, Vol. II." The tome is touted as being "the only copy-right edition." It has a notice from W. J. Hardee, Colonel, Confederate States Army, inside the front cover. The notice was written from Fort Morgan, Ala., on June 18, 1861. The book was printed in the "First Year of the Confederacy." An inscription inside the front cover reads: "Lieut H. F. Smith, Co C & E, 38th Tenn Regt., Corinth, Mississippi, May the 10th, 1862."
